From Middle High German ver-, from Old High German far-, from a mixture of Proto-Germanic *firi-, *fra-, *furi- and other similar particles. Cognate with English for-, Dutch ver-, Yiddish ×¤Ö¿×Ö·×¨Ö¾ (far-), Gothic ğ†ğŒ°ğŒ¹ğ‚- (fair-), ğ†ğŒ°ğŒ¿ğ‚- (faur-), ğ†ğ‚ğŒ°- (fra-), Latin per-.
